Uses of Interface
com.he.pc.controller.logic.hardware.oshi.hardware.GlobalMemory

  • Packages that use GlobalMemory 
    Package Description
    com.he.pc.controller.logic.hardware.oshi
    [oshi-core API] Provides a cross-platform implementation to retrieve Operating System and Hardware Information, such as OS version, memory, CPU, disk, devices, sensors, etc.
    com.he.pc.controller.logic.hardware.oshi.hardware
    [oshi-core API] Provides cross-platform implementation to retrieve hardware information such as CPU, Memory, Display, Disks, Network Interfaces, Power Sources, Sensors, and USB Devices
    com.he.pc.controller.logic.hardware.oshi.hardware.common
    Provides abstract classes for common code
    com.he.pc.controller.logic.hardware.oshi.hardware.platform.linux
    Provides information about hardware such as Memory, Power Sources, and Processor on Linux systems
    com.he.pc.controller.logic.hardware.oshi.hardware.platform.mac
    Provides information about hardware such as Memory, Power Sources, and Processor on Mac systems
    com.he.pc.controller.logic.hardware.oshi.hardware.platform.unix.freebsd
    Provides information about hardware such as Memory, Power Sources, and Processor on FreeBSD systems
    com.he.pc.controller.logic.hardware.oshi.hardware.platform.unix.solaris
    Provides information about hardware such as Memory, Power Sources, and Processor on Solaris systems
    com.he.pc.controller.logic.hardware.oshi.hardware.platform.windows
    Provides information about hardware such as Memory, Power Sources, and Processor on Windows systems
    com.he.pc.model
